      • Nonce

        public AccountInfo.AccountInfoBuilder Nonce(Nonce Nonce)
        The current nonce for the account. That is, this is the first unused nonce from the perspective of the block that `AccountInfo` is for.
        Returns:
        this.

      • accountAmount

        public AccountInfo.AccountInfoBuilder accountAmount(CCDAmount accountAmount)

        Returns:
        this.

      • accountThreshold

        public AccountInfo.AccountInfoBuilder accountThreshold(int accountThreshold)
        The account threshold for this account i.e., how many credentials that needs to sign transactions for this account.

        Note. the account threshold is a positive number t <= n, where n is the number of credentials associated with the account. See AccountInfo.accountCredentials

        Returns:
        this.

      • accountEncryptionKey

        public AccountInfo.AccountInfoBuilder accountEncryptionKey(ElgamalPublicKey accountEncryptionKey)
        The encryption key for the account. Note. This is the encryption key used for receiving encrypted amounts.
        Returns:
        this.

      • accountIndex

        public AccountInfo.AccountInfoBuilder accountIndex(AccountIndex accountIndex)
        A positive and sequential index of the account which is increasing in the order of creation. If the account is registered as a baker, then this is also the `baker id`.
        Returns:
        this.

      • bakerInfo

        public AccountInfo.AccountInfoBuilder bakerInfo(Baker bakerInfo)
        If the account is registered as a baker, then this will be not null containing Baker information.
        Returns:
        this.
